title: Bonus: Vix Pervenit - Encyclical On Usury
description:
I will be doing an episode or two on Vix Pervenit later this week, so to prepare, here is a reading of that encyclical.

Vix Pervenit - His Holiness Pope Benedict XIV, 1745
